message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be very happy with it.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay up to $100 for it.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $100 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $105.  Let's meet in the middle.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I can't go above $100, but I'm willing to match your previous offer at $105 if you're willing to meet me halfway.
